description: Developed and documented RESTful APIs for Back-Office software in the banking sector using Java and Spring Boot within a microservices architecture.
Met tight delivery deadlines by coordinating with the frontend team for integration of various functionalities.
Passed SonarQube quality controls using tools like JUnit and Mockito for unit testing.
Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams to transform functional requirements into technical requirements.
Implemented batches with Spring Batch for massive data processing.
Performed Oracle SQL and MongoDB database optimizations.
Developed web pages and performed infrastructure maintenance on AWS.
Migrated domain servers and email clients between providers to optimize costs and improve workflow efficiency.
Designed products and catalogs, attending conferences to support sales.
